# Required Packages

We'll be loading the following R packages: 

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true
#| code-line-numbers: false
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(shinycssloaders)
library(markdown)
```
